name: World Summit and Expo on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery (WSEMCDD2024
content: Dear Esteemed Colleagues, On behalf of the organizing committee, it is with great pleasure and anticipation that I extend a warm invitation to you to join us at the 2024 World Summit and Expo on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery (WSEMCDD2024). As the Chair of this event, I am honored to invite you to be a part of this transformative gathering. Scheduled to take place from August 22-24, 2024 in the historic city of Edinburg, our conference aims to bring together the leading experts in the fields of Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery. This international platform will provide an exceptional opportunity to exchange knowledge, foster collaborations, and explore innovative solutions that address the pressing challenges facing our world today. The International Congress and Expo will showcase cutting-edge research, breakthrough technologies, and creative ideas that have the potential to shape the future of our built environment. Through a series of thought-provoking plenary and keynote speeches, and interactive thematic sessions, we will explore the latest advancements in Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery. As a distinguished professional in your field, your expertise and insights would be invaluable in enriching the dialogue at our summit. Your presence will not only contribute to the success of the event but also provide a unique platform for networking with fellow experts, industry leaders, and policymakers from around the globe. We look forward to your valued presence at the World Summit and Expo on Medicinal Chemistry, Drug Discovery & Drug Delivery (WSEMCDD2024)). Together, let us shape new pathways, ignite innovative ideas, and shape a sustainable future for generations to come. Sincerely yours, Prof. Iwao Ojima University Distinguished Professor Stony Brook University, USA Chair: WSEMCDD2024
